pages.title: Infos
pages.text: Item usage as follows:$(br)$(li)hold items$(li)used items$(li)armor$(br2)Different items have different strong values, some also have a durability.

pages.title: Cooling Items
pages.text: $(li)snow (in general)$(li)ice (in general)$(li)powder snow bucket$(li)ice pack$(li)cold eye$(li)heart of the sea
cools you dont but has a durability.

pages.title: Heating Items
pages.text: $(li)torches (in general)$(li)campfires (in general)$(li)blaze powder$(li)blaze rod$(li)magma cream$(li)fire charge$(li)lava bucket$(li)heating stones$(li)sconce (in general)$(li)nether eye
heats you up but has a durability.$(br2)Put them in the furnace to heaten them up.

pages.title: Cooling Armor
pages.text: $(li)Wanderer Armor$(li)Chefs Outfit$(li)Bone Armor$(li)Wither Armor$(li)Robe Armor$(li)Vinemaker Outfit
